channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Children’s skincare products could contain a hidden danger, study finds
item.description: Children's skin and hair products may contain harmful chemicals that could potentially put their health and development at risk.

item.title: Senior Russian General Killed in Car Explosion Near Moscow
item.description: The general’s death is the latest in a series of fatalities involving Ukraine’s opponents inside Russia. The authorities in Kyiv had no immediate comm...

item.title: Hegseth’s Personal Phone Use Created Vulnerabilities
item.description: The phone number used in the Signal chat could also be found in a variety of places, including on social media and a fantasy sports site.

item.title: Banks getting the upper hand on card fraud but social scams getting worse, Mastercard says
item.description: AI is changing the cybersecurity game both for crooks and those protecting consumers.

item.title: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu Offers Condolences 3 Days After Pope Francis Died
item.description: The delay in issuing a statement reflected apparent tensions between Israel and Francis, who criticized Israel’s conduct in the war in Gaza.

item.title: Inside the Target CEO meeting with Black leaders amid the company’s DEI rollback and the boycott that followed
item.description: “It did not come up to all that we're expecting or needing.”

item.title: Cardinal Roger Mahony, Accused of Hiding Sex Abuse, Will Help Close Pope Francis’ Casket
item.description: Cardinal Roger M. Mahony, who was accused of covering up cases of abuse as archbishop of Los Angeles, will have an official role in the ceremonies aro...

item.title: The Trump Organization is now selling ‘Trump 2028’ hats
item.description: Sales once again raises question of Trump's intentions.

item.title: George Santos, Expelled From House, Now Faces Sentencing
item.description: Federal prosecutors want Mr. Santos, whose pattern of lies and fraud led to his expulsion from Congress, to be sentenced to 87 months in prison.

item.title: Phoebe Gates ‘did not expect to be a founder.’ Now she’s building the shopping assistant Phia with Sophia Kianni
item.description: Their new shopping assistant is inspired by Google Flights.

item.title: Francis Wanted a Church of the Poor and Put It Into Practice
item.description: Around St. Peter’s Square, the pope offered services to the homeless and migrants, in ways that often did not go down well with his fellow clerics.

item.title: Map: 6.3-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Ecuador
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.description: The delay in issuing a statement reflected apparent tensions between Israel and Francis, who criticized Israel’s conduct in the war in Gaza.
